posts.post_content:
Hello everyone I got into this set at in beginning of the summer and I just don't like the way I approached the set at all. Im trying to sell all my cards that I have collected to this point. I have 74 cards graded and ungraded ranging from 1-5 and some of the ungraded could get a 6 or even a 7! Every card has a readable back, that was a big one for me. The backs on the cards are Piedmont, Honest Long Cut,Polar Bear, Sovereign, Sweet Caporal and even 3 Cycle backs and 1 of them is a Joe Tinker. If anyone is interested in buying the whole bunch please PM me and i will give you a list and pictures. Thanks!

IF ANYONE IS INTERESTED IN DOING AROUND HALF THE LOT I WILL ENTERTAIN OFFERS AS WELL!
If anyone can do $SOLD on the lot the whole things yours. 
Eddie Collins (Mouth Closed) Beckett 2.5

If you dont sell them as a lot, id be interested in some singles, and seeing scans and prices.
I would also potentially be interested in purchasing some of the cards if you decide to break the lot up.
I would also be interested if your set were to be broken up.
Of course I'd have a look as well.
Would also be interested in singles. Thanks
Ditto on singles here. Especially lower condition with readable backs.
I will second Taylor's response.  Always interested in T205 singles

I also would be interested in a few singles if you break up the set.
John
Adam. Thanks for the lot. Payment sent. Don
